name: Monster Vault
description:
Monster Vault was a project I (mostly) solo developed in 2019-2020. It was my take on the auto-battler genre featuring collectible monsters, tactical gameplay, and emergent strategies.

Delve deep into the heart of the beast capturing monsters and building the ultimate team. Combine their powers in new and exciting ways, and build a strategy powerful enough to destroy the Monster Vault once and for all!

Developed with the LOVE game framework (https://love2d.org/)

The 0.2.0 version looks the nicest and has the most features, but it's buggy. The 0.1.3a version is older but more stable.

Credits:

Marshall Cannon - Game Design and Code (https://twitter.com/marshall_cannon)

Keaton Clark - Pixel Art (The good stuff, placeholder art is from a pokemon fan game) (https://twitter.com/PixelKeats)

Nikolas Santiago - Music and Sound Design (https://niksantiago.bandcamp.com/)
